# SwitchSiteInfo

**Properties**

| Name | Type | Required | Description                                                                |
| :--- | :--- | :------- | :------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| id\_ | str  | ❌       | Internal identifier of a site. The company identifier value is 'main-site' |
| name | str  | ❌       | Name of a site                                                             |
